meanings.definition: Relating to or used for killing weeds.
meanings.sent1: The herbicidal spray effectively eliminated the unwanted plants in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use herbicidal chemicals to control the growth of weeds in their fields.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit sprayed herbicidal solution on the garden, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: His words were like herbicidal thoughts, cutting down any hope of reconciliation.
meanings.sent5: The herbicidal effect of the potion was so strong that even the hardiest weeds withered away.

meanings.definition: Capable of destroying or inhibiting the growth of plants.
meanings.sent1: The herbicidal properties of the new fertilizer helped the crops thrive.
meanings.sent2: Certain herbicidal substances can harm both weeds and desired plants.
meanings.sent3: The herbicidal rain poured down relentlessly, stunting the growth of all vegetation.
meanings.sent4: The herbicidal power of the sun's rays scorched the earth, leaving barren landscapes.
meanings.sent5: The herbicidal nature of the invasive species threatened the delicate ecosystem of the forest.
